backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and stock item CRUD with role checks and time-stamped inventory updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking app features to source files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend files, their purposes, and recent feature additions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry component that shows a loading screen, login screen, or stock register depending on identity state.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginScreen.t: UI for Internet Identity login with error handling, loading states, and branded layout.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/com: Date navigation component with month, year, and day selectors using getDaysInMonth for accurate month lengths.
UI bar providing add, print, export, and layout selection controls for the stock register.
Editable table for stock register rows with inputs, formatting, and optional print‑only mode.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/dat: Utility functions for timezone‑safe parsing, formatting, and comparison of YYYY‑MM‑DD dates.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/exp: Generates CSV files for row or matrix layouts and triggers file download with proper formatting.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/gri: Provides basic numeric calculations and formatting helpers for stock register fields.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/mon: Builds day‑by‑day matrix structures and CSV rows from register rows, including item grouping.
Renders a matrix table showing daily stock data per item with grouped column headers.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/pri: Print‑optimized view that displays either the row grid or matrix layout with header details.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/sta: React hook managing selected year, month, and focused day for register filtering.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/Sto: Main stock register UI handling filters, row/matrix layouts, printing, Excel export, and logout logic.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/typ: Type definitions for register rows, filters, and layout modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence. Wraps AuthClient with custom options and exposes login state helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base, theme variables, dark mode palettes, global styles, and detailed print formatting rules. Establishes CSS variables for consistent theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider. Imports global styles and renders App into the root element.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: TypeScript declaration file providing type definitions for the xlsx module's workbook, sheets, utilities, and read/write functions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage values, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, container settings, fonts, animations, and dark mode support using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata, feature definitions, and pending feature requests related to authentication and backend access control.
